Description: Rectangular wooden plinth for an Osiris figure; depression for the feet at the back behind a lidded compartment in the shape of a nefer-sign; bitumen on the top.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 157)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair
